nodes.text: Downtown BC was a district of Bralanak City on Trymant IV. After the planet was devastated by an Emergence of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, former Trymant resident Zeen Mrala, accompanied by Jedi Master Kantam Sy and their Padawan Lula Talisola, returned there in search of the Elders of the Path. While searching for the sect's compound, Mrala thought the trio was a little south of the downtown, and Sy confirmed it, which Mrala knew meant they were close.
